comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: Punt.com on March 14, 2023, 01:00:23 AM5 Total Banners needed, for the following ranks: Member, Full Member, Sr. Member, Hero Member, and Legendary. ($200 for all 5). Then you are looking for signature design, not banner design. Both are different. Signature code is designed by bbcode which can't be with mouse over affect.If you are not looking for signature code but html banner, wondering if you know that ad auction has been paused for a while.Have you hired a campaign manager already? If not, feel free to visit my campaign management service- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5180747.0

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Why it needs for the mentioned ranks when it is a bitcointalk ad banner in first place? Bitcointalk ad banner and rank signature that can be seen in every signature space (below every post) are two different things. You can't have a hover effect in signature space too. So you should be specific if what you are trying to be done. If its a bitcointalk ad (that usually be seen on forum ads slot) or signature space for the mentioned tanks.Edit: all were mentioned above, posted a minute ahead of me.

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Quote from: Punt.com on March 14, 2023, 01:00:23 AMWill send $200 in crypto for best submission, must comply with bitcointalk ad banner/signature rules HTML/CSS (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5141283.0)Sounds like a contest but just in case you're in dire need of someone to design it ASAP, try reaching out to Jayce, he's the best in the forum when it comes to signature/html banner designs.His service thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You could do a signature contest as well and get the top designers on the forum competing. Pick from all the designs and split the prize $150 for 1st $50 for 2nd or whatever suits you. I have included a couple examples of contests below. You can use the search function and find a few more if needed.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5249397.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5430222.0My recommendation is Jayce but feel free to choose whomever you want to do the work.

And I'm quite happy with that.Quotemust comply with bitcointalk ad banner/signature rules HTML/CSSThe forum stopped selling ads half a year ago.
